notes: [Added] Initial release of Freeform Next.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform Next would not install on sites using MySQL 5.5 and lower.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where new statuses could not be created.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where some sites might see an error when attempting to create new fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Composer would error and show a blank white page in some cases.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Mailing List and CRM pages would sometimes display an error.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the version number update process wouldn't work correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform Updates Service was writing to add-on folder instead of EE Cache directory.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where unchecking ALL filetype options for File Upload fields in Fields area would not save preferences.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where {field_name} syntax would NOT parse in Subject/From Name/From Email/Reply-to fields when not Storing Submissions in DB.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where an error might display when viewing submissions list in the CP in some circumstances.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug with MailChimp integration where it would only load a maximum of 10 MailChimp custom fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where orphaned mailing list setups would error in Composer.
[Added] Added a Sandbox option for Salesforce integration in Pro version.
[Added] Added option to use database instead of PHP sessions for storing state of form submissions.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where forms would not submit correctly for some users.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where single checkbox fields were not saving the user's selection if errors were triggered.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where single checkboxes were not displaying the field value in email notifications.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where email validation was allowing some invalid syntax.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Update Service would error if it couldn't connect to Solspace.com.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Mailer extension hooks were not working correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where 1.0.4 upgrade would show errors in CP for some installs.
[Improved] Updated Composer to show hash handles for Submit and HTML blocks so they can be accessible manually in frontend templates.
[Improved] Updated textareas to now automatically convert newlines to line breaks when outputting data in templates or email notifications.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where selected values for fields with options would not output correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where tabbing through labels and values in Field creation/editing area would reset values.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the honeypot field for spam protection did not have spaces in-between attributes.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Composer would have JS errors when creating new fields while using Sessions only in CP.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where creating a new File Upload field (Fields area) would trigger an error if a value wasn't specified for Maximum Filesize.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where single Checkbox fields would always return the default value for the field in Submissions tag and email notifications, whether or not the checkbox is checked.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where quick creating fields, email templates and formatting templates in Composer would not autoload them into the list.
[Added] Added new Field types for Pro version: Confirmation, Date & Time, Number, Phone, Rating, Regex, Website.
[Added] Added advanced Quick Export and Export Profiles options in Pro version.
[Added] Added a setting to hide Solspace default formatting templates from showing in Formatting Template dropdown list in Composer.
[Added] Added an example formatting template and demo template for Materialize framework.
[Added] Added form anchor to be automatically generated so inline error returns can focus down to form, if it's lower down on page.
[Improved] Updated Freeform to use EE's Email service instead of it's own.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where '{field:checked}' variable was not working for manual implementations of checkbox fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where date_range_start/end and date_range parameters were not working in Submissions template tag.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where status filtering would result in an error in the Submissions template tag.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where no errors would be triggered if attempting to create a blank field (no name or handle, etc).
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where fresh installs would error after install.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where some field specific property variables were unavailable for parsing on front end in manual implementations.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where single Checkbox fields would not remember their selection if the form errored or if the submitter went back a page in multi-page forms.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where fields with array data would display as a literal array when exporting in CSV.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where an array of data in select fields for Salesforce API integration could cause an error.
[Added] Added new SharpSpring CRM API integration for Pro version.
[Added] Added auto-disable Submit button feature once a user clicks Submit (and a setting for it in control panel).
[Improved] Updated 'form_attributes' parameter to allow no attribute value (to achieve 'novalidate' instead of 'novalidate="true"', etc).
[Improved] Updated form submissions in Submissions list of control panel to be ordered by newest date first as default.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform was allowing double (or more) submitting of forms if users kept clicking the Submit button while it was loading.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where instruction text would overlap the 'remove' link (if long enough) for single Checkbox fields in Composer interface.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Pro fieldtype fields would not show as options for mapping to API integrations.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the SharpSpring integration would error in some cases.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where editing a field in main fields area (Freeform -> Fields) would error on the fieldtype selection.
[Added] Added Max Length option to be set inside Composer for Text and Textarea fields.
[Improved] Updated CP views to be compatible with ExpressionEngine 4.
[Improved] Updated Date & Time field to no longer switch to being handled by browser in Mobile view due to chances of incorrect formatting.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Dynamic Recipients field would not remember which selection was chosen if the page reloaded after triggering an error.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Date & Time field date picker was not working correctly for IE 11.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'instructions_below_field' parameter was not correctly accepting 'yes' and 'no'.
[Added] Updated for compatibility with both ExpressionEngine 4 and ExpressionEngine 3.
[Improved] Renamed Freeform Next and Freeform Next Pro to just Freeform Lite and Freeform Pro, respectively. Folder and namespace are still 'freeform_next' to preserve legacy with Freeform Classic.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the automated handle generator JS would make you wrestle with it sometimes.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Composer would choke on form handles and field handles that contained 'true' or 'false' strings in them.
[Improved] Updated the auto-scroll for error return handling to be more reliable.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform would not install and error for some customers on EE4.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where CP pages were not being styled correctly in EE4.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform was not translatable with language files.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform would not install due to a 'max key length' error for some customers on EE4.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Spam protection feature's 'count' in control panel was incrementing incorrectly with each successful submission.
[Added] Added 'Express' edition of Freeform, which is a lower cost option for smaller/simpler sites.
[Improved] Improved Composer interface to have sticky/locking auto-scrolling side columns. This makes searching through available fields and working with longer forms easier.
[Added] Added Fluid fieldtype compatibility for the Freeform channel entry fieldtype.
[Improved] Updated Salesforce integration to work with checkbox fields.
[Fixed] Fixed some visual bugs in Composer interface between EE3 and EE4 versions.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where creating new fields with options would not save any default selections.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the toggle switch was not displaying correctly for allowing values for fieldtypes with options in EE4.
[Added] Added setting to remove newlines from textarea fields for exporting.
[Fixed] Fixed a visual bug for right column buttons in Composer interface for EE3.
[Added] Added Migration utility (beta) for migrating Freeform Classic data.
[Added] Added a 'Use Double Opt-in?' setting for MailChimp integrations.
[Improved] Included an update that adjusts database key lengths of fields for compatibility with utf8mb4 character set in EE4.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Dynamic Recipients notifications sometimes would not work correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the default value and placeholder attributes were not applied to Website fields when added to form in Composer.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where deleting fields was not removing them from forms.
[Improved] Updated File Upload fields to have the ability to accept multiple files.
[Improved] Updated Classic migration utility to migrate File Upload fields with multiple files correctly now.
[Improved] Updated Dynamic Recipients field to have the ability to accept multiple recipients.
[Improved] Updated demo templates and default formatting templates to correctly handle Dynamic Recipients field as a radio group.
[Improved] Updated Checkbox fieldtype to show a warning in Composer when no value is set.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where using Dynamic Recipients fieldtype as Radio display would not send email notifications.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where multi-option field types had ID attributes that were not unique for each option by default.
[Improved] Updated multi-page limit in Composer to 100 pages.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Radio Group fields would have their last option selected no matter what, when using sample formatting templates.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Select fields would not send data in email notifications.
[Added] Added Pipedrive CRM integration for Freeform Pro edition.
[Added] Added new settings for Salesforce CRM integration for assignment rules and accounts with custom URLs in Salesforce.
[Added] Added a setting for spam protection that allows you to control the behavior of submit return (to simulate a successful submit).
[Added] Added warnings in Composer to show if a field has a blank handle.
[Added] Added Freeform fieldtype support for the Grid fieldtype.
[Added] Added a {field:option_value} variable for multi-option field types in email notification templates (for accessing the field option value instead of option label).
[Added] Added 'form_before_submit' and 'form_after_submit' extension hooks.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where checkbox an radio group field type option labels were not translatable.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the File Upload fieldtype was not fully compatible with PHP 5.4.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform might conflict with other add-ons.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Edit Layout modal in CP Submissions list page was not loading correctly.
[Improved] Updated Constant Contact API integration to no longer use OAuth and fixed a bug with it not connecting correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where upgrading from Express edition to Lite/Pro edition would not install the Freeform fieldtype for channel entries.
[Fixed] Fixed an XSS security vulnerability with submitting forms.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where a 'Handle Missing' error would display incorrectly for Mailing List fields in Composer layout.
[Added] Added 'beforePush' and 'afterPush' developer hooks for API integrations.
[Added] Added 'use_action_url="yes"' parameter to Form tag as a workaround when loading a form with AJAX and submitting normally.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Salesforce fetch token URL regex restriction was not allowing for less common URLs to pass through.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where saving a channel entry with no Freeform form selected in the fieldtype would store a '0' instead of 'NULL'.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where viewing submissions in the CP with an upload field with missing files could result in an error shown.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'Express' edition check was writing files to the add-on directory and not the cache directory.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the hidden Spam honeypot field label was missing the 'for' attribute.
[Added] Added 'date_created' variable for availability in email notification templates.
[Improved] Updated form validation to no longer allow a single space as a valid value for required fields.
[Improved] Updated HubSpot integration to load custom fields from Contacts, Companies and Deals endpoints now, not just Deals.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Salesforce fetch token URL regex restriction was not allowing for less common URLs to pass through.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'unfinalized_files' database table was not correctly removing rows when a multi-page form was successfully submitted, causing uploaded files to be removed.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where multi-page forms were losing track of field data for autogenerated titles in form submissions.

[Added] Added field option Data Feeders for Checkbox group, Radio group, Select and Multi-select fieldtypes. You can now populate these fields with Entries, Categories, Members, or one of our many predefined options: States, Provinces, Countries, Languages, Number ranges, Year ranges, Months, Days and Days of the Week. Freeform Data Feeders also offer flexible control over formatting and/or which data fills option labels and option values.
[Added] Added Multi-select fieldtype.
[Added] Added filtering options in CP Submissions list view.
[Added] Added reCAPTCHA support for Freeform Pro edition.
[Added] Added dotmailer mailing list integration for Freeform Pro edition.
[Added] Added Member Group Permissions controls - allow or deny access to various pages and parts of Freeform control panel.
[Added] Added ability to render Dynamic Recipients as checkboxes, and now allows submitter to select more than 1 option.
[Added] Added ability to set Mailing List fields as hidden fields (automatically opting in users).
[Added] Added a variety of thorough AJAX examples to demo templates!
[Added] Added support for mapping to website, URL, dropdown, radio, date and zip fields in MailChimp integration.
[Improved] Updated SharpSpring integration to work with all custom field types.
[Improved] Updated column breakpoint for Bootstrap formatting templates to be 'sm' instead of 'lg'.
[Improved] Updated Freeform's automatically inserted JS to no longer include type='text/javascript'.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Classic Migration wouldn't work correctly in some cases.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'field:has_errors' conditional was not working.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where an error would show if using PHP 7.2 with error debugging enabled.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where mapping to MailChimp fields named as numbers would result in an error.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform would error for PHP 5.4.
[Fixed] Fixed minor visual errors throughout control panel.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where default selections for multi-option fields populated with predefined and EE data were not respecting default option selections on front end.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Classic Migration would stall while migrating submissions if a form contained no submissions.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform was converting number strings to actual numbers when saving the form.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where 'reCAPTCHA' was available as a fieldtype choice (it's only available as a special field).
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Dynamic Recipients fieldtype was parsing as '0', '1' etc instead of the option value.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Composer would error when using PHP 5.4 (EE3).
[Added] Added 'search:field="value"' parameter to Submissions template tag to allow filtering of results by field values.
[Fixed] Fixed a potential XSS vulnerability.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where some parts of Freeform would error when using PHP 5.4 (EE3).
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where editing an existing field's name in Field Editor would automatically rename the handle.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Field Editor was displaying an extra set of Default Value and Placeholder fields in settings.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where CP Forms list, Composer and front end forms render would error when using PHP 5.4 (EE3).
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where rendering a form on front end would error in PHP versions below 7.x (EE3).
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where extension hooks were not being uninstalled correctly.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where CP Submissions filters were not working correctly when using Session ID.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where submissions titles were not showing up correctly in some cases in CP Submissions list.
[Added] Added 'field_id_prefix' parameter to the Freeform:Form and Render tags to set a prefix value on field output. Helpful if you have more than 1 form on the same template and are sharing fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where having more than 1 form in the same template would cause one form to take over the other form if the page reloaded from errors being present.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the JS autoscroll feature would act up if there was an error on a form and there was more than 1 form in the same page.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where using data feeders from EE Entries, etc in Freeform fields would significantly impact submit wait time for forms on front end.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the US States predefined options list contained more than official states. Also added a States & Territories list that contains official states and territories.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the CP submission list date filters were not including the selected end date range in results.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'use_action_url' parameter was not working correctly in Freeform:Form and Render tags.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the CP submission list filters were missing some translations.
[Improved] Updated Classic migration to maintain original submission dates of migrated submissions.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Classic migrations could stop working in rare cases.
[Added] Added 'Automatically Scroll to Form on Errors and Multipage forms?' setting to allow the ability to disable this feature.
[Improved] Updated Salesforce Lead integration to clear out all empty values before submitting to Salesforce.
[Fixed] Fixed a potential XSS vulnerability.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where editing submission field layouts in Submissions CP list page were sometimes not working.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Submission CP list page could error if the form contained fields which had no values submitted previously.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'Automatically Scroll to Form on Errors and Multipage forms?' setting was not working for multi-page form returns.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Freeform channel entry fieldtype could prematurely trigger submit logic in certain scenarios.

[Fixed] Fixed a bug where setting the 'maxlength' option for text and textarea fields to a value inside Composer, and then clearing the value, would result in the form rendering with 'maxlength' of '0'.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where form rendering was automatically inserting in empty 'maxlength' and 'placeholder' attributes.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Freeform Permissions did not include controls for the Email Notifications section.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where checkboxes were not showing as checked in CP submission individual view.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where CP Submissions searching did not include field types like Hidden, Select, etc.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the CP submissions single detail view would error if a mailing list field was set to hidden.
[Added] Added Insightly CRM Lead integration for Freeform Pro edition.
[Fixed] Fixed a potential XSS security vulnerability when displaying form submissions.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Migration utility could sometimes error.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Freeform fieldtype would display errors in Live Preview if no form was assigned to the entry.
[Improved] Updated file upload field values in email notification templates to return as pipe-delimited IDs to accomodate usage with File:Entries tag.
[Added] Added support for Bloqs add-on.
[Added] Added basic Portuguese and French translations files.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Textarea fields were no longer properly parsing linebreaks in email notifications.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where hidden fields couldn't be searched upon in the Submissions CP page.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where fields with predefined options containing numeric values were excluded from email notifications.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Classic migration utility would choke on form names that started with a number.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where EE data feeders were not including data from all fields when using to populate Freeform multi-option fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where adding a sample template to Formatting Templates section would not work if you have a relative path set.
[Added] Added Table field type, which allows users to enter repeating data rows into predefined columns (Pro).
[Added] Added ability to edit submissions on the front end (Pro).
[Added] Added submission tokens, allowing you to more securely display (and edit) submission data in front end templates.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where line returns in Textarea fields wouldn't show up correctly in front end templates.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Lite and Express editions were displaying errors in the control panel and forms were not submitting correctly on the front end.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'Automatically Scroll to Form on Errors and Multipage forms' setting was no longer working.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where data for Dynamic Recipients fields was not correctly displaying in the Submissions template tag and email notification templates.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where formatting Table field data in the Submissions template tag and email notifications was not possible.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the 'token' parameter was not working for the Submissions template tag.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where some number field types were not showing up for the Salesforce API integration.
[Added] Added ability to duplicate forms.
[Fixed] Fixed a potential security vulnerability with submitting of forms.
